emergence_clusters.title: Seed drop: core model + first modules + knowledge seed
emergence_clusters.visible_repo_change_summary: Early bulk addition establishes the MGK core concept file, explicit layer IDs, initial module families (Zeitgeist, ZG-CB, Family), and a seeded Knowledge base (places + knowledge schema).
emergence_clusters.likely_internal_preparation: The volume and internal consistency suggest offline drafting and batch integration; core metadata explicitly indicates a concept-to-structure workflow (including AI-assisted structuring).

subphases.conceptual_step: Define the core separation model (epistemic vs resonance; data vs memory vs gaps vs mirror space).
subphases.description: Creates the shared semantic backbone referenced across the repo.

subphases.conceptual_step: Introduce the first content module families as repeatable templates.
subphases.description: Establishes consistent module layouts (meta, context, mappings, exercises).

subphases.conceptual_step: Seed the Knowledge layer with place corpora and a knowledge-node schema.
subphases.description: Provides grounded collections to anchor modules and later analysis.

interview_questions: Was war innerlich bereits vorbereitet, bevor es hier implementiert wurde?
War das eine geplante Struktur oder eine Nacht-und-Nebel-Aktion?
Gab es hier einen Moment von Klarheit?
Was fühlte sich größer an als du selbst?

emergence_clusters.title: Architecture → interface blueprint (DP-001 + view specs)
emergence_clusters.visible_repo_change_summary: Adds the architecture DP layer (DP-001) and formal interface view specifications (MapView, GraphView, ResonancePanel) with explicit layer mappings and transitions.
emergence_clusters.likely_internal_preparation: The view specs mirror DP-001 vocabulary and structure, implying the UI model existed conceptually before being encoded as JSON contracts.

subphases.conceptual_step: Formalize the anthropological interface architecture as DP-001.
subphases.description: Separates interface philosophy from domain data.

subphases.conceptual_step: Encode Map/Graph/Resonance views as an operational interface contract.
subphases.description: Defines how layers appear, how nodes/edges behave, and how navigation transitions work.

subphases.conceptual_step: Bind the interface to the layer model as a non-negotiable representation constraint.
subphases.description: Treats UI as an epistemic instrument rather than a neutral display.

interview_questions: Was war innerlich bereits vorbereitet, bevor es hier implementiert wurde?
War das eine geplante Struktur oder eine Nacht-und-Nebel-Aktion?
Gab es hier einen Moment von Klarheit?
Was fühlte sich größer an als du selbst?

emergence_clusters.title: Shared primitives: intake, anchors, and linking
emergence_clusters.visible_repo_change_summary: Introduces shared primitives for growth and navigation: candidate intake workflow, marker pool as neutral anchors, and crosslinks/pattern objects for explicit relationships.
emergence_clusters.likely_internal_preparation: Templates and indices suggest expected long-term accumulation and a need to separate discovery, observation, and structured integration.

subphases.conceptual_step: Create Candidate Pool as an incubation workflow.
subphases.description: Defines a pre-integration state machine for fundstuecke.

subphases.conceptual_step: Create Marker Pool as a neutral observation archive (no forced relations).
subphases.description: Buffers observation from thesis formation and tolerates contradiction.

subphases.conceptual_step: Make relationships explicit via crosslinks and small reusable patterns.
subphases.description: Introduces typed links and portable pattern objects as shared building blocks.

interview_questions: Was war innerlich bereits vorbereitet, bevor es hier implementiert wurde?
War das eine geplante Struktur oder eine Nacht-und-Nebel-Aktion?
Gab es hier einen Moment von Klarheit?
Was fühlte sich größer an als du selbst?

emergence_clusters.title: Data layer pivot + tooling migration (schema, lenses, cartography, validation)
emergence_clusters.visible_repo_change_summary: Introduces `data/` as a canonical layer (schemas, lenses, build_on_old, human cartography), adds repo-wide tooling under `src/`, and declares a legacy tooling migration path.
emergence_clusters.likely_internal_preparation: The combination of canonical schemas, scripts, and migration policy suggests a scaling inflection: more artifacts required guardrails and repeatable operations.

subphases.conceptual_step: Define canonical node/edge schemas and edge-type vocabulary.
subphases.description: Creates cross-domain structural contracts for nodes and edges.

subphases.conceptual_step: Introduce lenses as reusable analytical tools (and build_on_old for stratification/migration).
subphases.description: Adds tool-like patterns (meta_patterns, etc.) and normalization rules for legacy integration.

subphases.conceptual_step: Establish `src/` tooling and validation; mark legacy tooling as deprecated.
subphases.description: Implements operational scripts (add/link) and a repo-wide validator under a migrate-on-touch policy.

interview_questions: Was war innerlich bereits vorbereitet, bevor es hier implementiert wurde?
War das eine geplante Struktur oder eine Nacht-und-Nebel-Aktion?
Gab es hier einen Moment von Klarheit?
Was fühlte sich größer an als du selbst?

emergence_clusters.title: Epistemic hygiene + crisis datasets + mission guardrails
emergence_clusters.visible_repo_change_summary: Adds explicit epistemic posture (DP-002), mission/guardrails (DP-004), and crisis-analysis datasets (covid scaffolds; later PDSA with schema + validation reports).
emergence_clusters.likely_internal_preparation: The explicit posture and mission documents look like guardrails against interpretive overreach; crisis datasets appear as stress-tests for applying MGK structure to real events under evidence constraints.

subphases.conceptual_step: Codify epistemic posture and mission-level guardrails.
subphases.description: Defines what MGK does not do (evaluate/instruct) and how to resist ideology formation.

subphases.conceptual_step: Create crisis-analysis scaffolds with separated channels.
subphases.description: Splits time witness, structure markers, resonance markers, and raw placeholders.

subphases.conceptual_step: Methodize crisis analysis into schema-backed datasets (PDSA).
subphases.description: Adds multi-level separation (data/discourse/structure/interpretation) and strict source policy.

interview_questions: Was war innerlich bereits vorbereitet, bevor es hier implementiert wurde?
War das eine geplante Struktur oder eine Nacht-und-Nebel-Aktion?
Gab es hier einen Moment von Klarheit?
Was fühlte sich größer an als du selbst?

emergence_clusters.title: Evidence ingestion pipeline (sources → witnesses → lenses → epistemic documents)
emergence_clusters.visible_repo_change_summary: Builds an evidence pipeline: sources registry and raw transcripts, Zeitzeugenberichte as structured extracts, zeitgeist-pattern lenses derived from witness clusters, and epistemic documents as knowledge-practice artifacts with shared schema.
emergence_clusters.likely_internal_preparation: The recurring layout (raw + metadata + index + reports) suggests repeatable ingestion and semi-automated extraction; epistemic documents indicate interest in representation/measurement artifacts beyond testimony.

subphases.conceptual_step: Introduce sources with raw storage + metadata + index.
subphases.description: Creates a stable input layer for later extracts and analyses.

subphases.conceptual_step: Add structured Zeitzeugenberichte and derived Zeitgeist-pattern lenses; add meta-agents.
subphases.description: Preserves multiple speaker positions and turns clusters into reusable analytic lenses.

subphases.conceptual_step: Create epistemic documents with shared schema for cross-epoch comparison.
subphases.description: Documents how knowledge was represented (e.g., maps) without judging correctness.

interview_questions: Was war innerlich bereits vorbereitet, bevor es hier implementiert wurde?
War das eine geplante Struktur oder eine Nacht-und-Nebel-Aktion?
Gab es hier einen Moment von Klarheit?
Was fühlte sich größer an als du selbst?

emergence_clusters.title: Process + personalization (THORUS loop, humor safety, resonance strands)
emergence_clusters.visible_repo_change_summary: Adds DP-003 THORUS operating loop and maps it into interface specs; introduces Humor module as sandbox observer; adds Resonance Strands and overlay schemas to encode individualized resonance without turning it into shared truth.
emergence_clusters.likely_internal_preparation: This appears as a maturity step from static storage to explicit epistemic workflow and perspective management, with safety boundaries to prevent escalation and schema drift.

subphases.conceptual_step: Define and integrate THORUS as a process constraint across views.
subphases.description: Maps loop steps to view behavior and UI signals.

subphases.conceptual_step: Add Humor module as a non-invasive observer artifact.
subphases.description: Codifies observer-not-actor and sandbox constraints.

subphases.conceptual_step: Encode personal resonance as strands and overlays with schemas/vocabularies.
subphases.description: Adds typed couplings and evidence grades for individualized reading traces.

interview_questions: Was war innerlich bereits vorbereitet, bevor es hier implementiert wurde?
War das eine geplante Struktur oder eine Nacht-und-Nebel-Aktion?
Gab es hier einen Moment von Klarheit?
Was fühlte sich größer an als du selbst?

emergence_clusters.title: Advanced analytic modules + late micro-taxonomies
emergence_clusters.visible_repo_change_summary: Introduces narrative/system modules (Narrative Ecology; Gedachtnistopologie with DP-005/DP-006), expands domain overlays (Imperium, Mythos), and adds late micro-taxonomies (regulation layers, label instances, shared pattern objects).
emergence_clusters.likely_internal_preparation: This reads as decomposition: moving from broad frames toward finer primitives, while adding DP/module documents to keep interpretation boundaries explicit.

subphases.conceptual_step: Model narratives as systems with analysis + experiential modes.
subphases.description: Adds a dedicated module with vocab/schemas and dual usage modes.

subphases.conceptual_step: Formalize fact–narrative feedback via Gedachtnistopologie DP + module.
subphases.description: Separates factual events, narratives, projection nodes, and transformation links.

subphases.conceptual_step: Add regulation/labeling primitives and small shared patterns; expand domain overlays.
subphases.description: Introduces additional taxonomies and pattern objects beyond tags/markers.

interview_questions: Was war innerlich bereits vorbereitet, bevor es hier implementiert wurde?
War das eine geplante Struktur oder eine Nacht-und-Nebel-Aktion?
Gab es hier einen Moment von Klarheit?
Was fühlte sich größer an als du selbst?

emergence_clusters.title: Governance + experiments: CI, schema routing, public/machine views
emergence_clusters.visible_repo_change_summary: Hardens governance (CI validation, schema routing, dev setup) and adds interface experiments (automated public surface; machine-native views and graph exports).
emergence_clusters.likely_internal_preparation: This looks like a maintainability response to scale and an explicit attempt to test MGK under reduction (public surface) and under machine-readable perspectives (graph exports).

subphases.conceptual_step: Automate validation and add schema routing for multi-schema collections.
subphases.description: Adds CI gating and path-based routing so different areas validate against different schemas.

subphases.conceptual_step: Run an automated public-surface experiment with explicit open questions.
subphases.description: Tests accessibility tradeoffs under non-evaluative, ambiguity-preserving constraints.

subphases.conceptual_step: Generate machine-native structural views and graph exports.
subphases.description: Treats repo structure as data for machine exploration and visualization.

War das eine geplante Struktur oder eine Nacht-und-Nebel-Aktion?
Gab es hier einen Moment von Klarheit?

module_blocks.role_in_architecture: Defines the semantic backbone (intent + layer IDs) referenced across data, interface, and analysis.
module_blocks.core_tension_or_purpose: Keep uncertainty visible without turning symbolic layers into hidden truth claims.
open_questions: How is layer canon maintained across concept spec, knowledge/layers, and interface specs?
interview_questions: Warum wurde dieses Modul notwendig?
Welche Lücke hat es geschlossen?
Ist dieses Modul unabhängig von deiner Biografie tragfähig?
Welche Gefahr besteht, wenn dieses Modul dogmatisch gelesen wird?

module_blocks.role_in_architecture: Meta-level design principles (interface philosophy, epistemic posture, operating loop, mission, memory topology).
module_blocks.core_tension_or_purpose: Strong guardrails without locking the project into ideology or a single worldview.
open_questions: How should DP-005 vs DP-006 be treated (versions, consolidation, or separate scopes)?
interview_questions: Warum wurde dieses Modul notwendig?
Welche Lücke hat es geschlossen?
Ist dieses Modul unabhängig von deiner Biografie tragfähig?
Welche Gefahr besteht, wenn dieses Modul dogmatisch gelesen wird?

module_blocks.core_tension_or_purpose: Make ambiguity usable without silently collapsing it into binary UI defaults.

module_blocks.core_tension_or_purpose: Structural comparison without moralizing; preserve ambiguity while staying operationally linkable.

anchor_points_for_reflection.description: Epistemic Layers L1-L4 (data, memory, gaps, mirror space).
anchor_points_for_reflection.why_it_matters: Primary anti-dogma mechanism: claim strength stays visible.
Makes interpretation staged and adds a private reflection zone.

anchor_points_for_reflection.description: Separation of architecture DPs from content data.
anchor_points_for_reflection.why_it_matters: Prevents UI/process philosophy from silently rewriting the corpus.

anchor_points_for_reflection.description: Marker Pool as non-committal observation archive.
anchor_points_for_reflection.why_it_matters: Buffers observation from thesis formation; supports contradiction.

anchor_points_for_reflection.description: Human Cartography + Resonance Strands as explicit perspective layer.
anchor_points_for_reflection.why_it_matters: Places individual meaning-making without converting it into shared certainty.

anchor_points_for_reflection.description: THORUS operating loop embedded in interface specs.
anchor_points_for_reflection.why_it_matters: Turns MGK from static storage into an explicit epistemic workflow.

anchor_points_for_reflection.description: Crisis Analysis separation (evidence vs interpretation) + strict source policy.
anchor_points_for_reflection.why_it_matters: Enables comparative analysis without teleology or unmarked speculation.

anchor_points_for_reflection.description: Schema routing + CI validation as governance guardrail.
anchor_points_for_reflection.why_it_matters: Prevents silent structural drift across hundreds of JSON artifacts.
